# Setting environment

### Load libraries

```{r include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(broom)
library(tidyverse)
```

### Set the wd

```{r}
# Actual xd
wd <- getwd()
print(wd)

# Create a new path if needed
data_dir <- file.path(wd,"datasets")
print(data_dir)
```

### Import datasets

```{r}
dataframe1 <- read.csv(file.path(data_dir,"exemple.csv"),header = TRUE, sep = "," ,strip.white = TRUE,fill = TRUE)
```

# Explore data

```{r}
head(dataframe1,n=15)
str(dataframe1)
#describe(dataframe1)
glimpse(dataframe1)
```

### Missing values

```{r warning=FALSE}

#Package naniar pour la visualisation des donnÃ©es manquantes
library(naniar)
# Nombre de valeurs manquantes
colSums(is.na(dataframe1))
#Visualisation graphique avec naniar
vis_miss(dataframe1)
prop_miss(dataframe1)
n_miss(dataframe1)
```
